name: DOCS_RCVD_RSLT_SPECS
description: This table stores discrete specimen information received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the received Document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SPEC_ORDER_REFID
columns.description: Unique identifier for result; ties multiple specimens to one result

columns.name: SPEC_REFID
columns.description: Unique identifier for this specimen, which ties it to codes stored in Mapping Information (SI DXR 7000).

columns.name: SPEC_EXTID
columns.description: External ID for specimen; may not be unique.

columns.name: SPEC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The Category ID for the specimen type (I ORD 300)

columns.name: SPEC_SOURCE_NAME
columns.description: The free text name of the specimen source.

columns.name: SPEC_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: The Category ID for the specimen source, from Specimen Source ID (I ORD 325).
